amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Postsecondary institution; authorization to operate required.
amendatorysection.para: Except as provided in section 85-2407, no postsecondary institution shall operate in the State of Nebraska by establishing a physical presence in this state until it has received an authorization to operate by the commission.
